trans-unit.source: # Update Repository To get the packages, it is necessary to update your local repository.
trans-unit.target: # Update Repository To get the packages, it is necessary to update your local repository.

trans-unit.source: ## Installation without Vagrant ### Requirements Install this softwares according to your operation system: * postgresql-9.4 * postgresql-9.4-debversion * python-argparse * python-debian * python-debianbts * python-inotifyx * python-paste * python-psycopg2 * python-pyramid * python-sqlalchemy * python-subversion * wget
trans-unit.target: ## Installation without Vagrant ### Requirements Install this softwares according to your operation system: * postgresql-9.4 * postgresql-9.4-debversion * python-argparse * python-debian * python-debianbts * python-inotifyx * python-paste * python-psycopg2 * python-pyramid * python-sqlalchemy * python-subversion * wget

trans-unit.source: ### Quick Start As root (waiting for python-pyramid-chameleon package, https://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi?bug=785048):
trans-unit.target: ### Quick Start As root (waiting for python-pyramid-chameleon package, https://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi?bug=785048):

trans-unit.source: As root (more precise: as a postgres superuser):
trans-unit.target: As root (more precise: as a postgres superuser):

trans-unit.source: Discussions go on the [pet-devel](https://lists.alioth.debian.org/mailman/listinfo/pet-devel) mailing list.
trans-unit.target: Discussions go on the [pet-devel](https://lists.alioth.debian.org/mailman/listinfo/pet-devel) mailing list.

trans-unit.source: Now, it is necessary to start vagrant up and access vagrants ssh. Follow this commands:
trans-unit.target: Теперь нужно запустить бродягу и получить доступ к бродягам ssh.Следуйте этим командам:

trans-unit.source: Now, update the packages with the names printed on
trans-unit.target: Теперь обновите пакеты с именами,напечатанными на

trans-unit.source: PET is a collection of scripts that gather informatio about your packages
trans-unit.target: PET-это набор сценариев,которые собирают информацию о ваших пакетах.

trans-unit.source: PET is a collection of scripts that gather information about your (or your group’s) packages. It allows you to see in a bird’s eye view the health of hundreds of packages, instantly realizing where work is needed.
trans-unit.target: PET is a collection of scripts that gather information about your (or your group’s) packages. It allows you to see in a bird’s eye view the health of hundreds of packages, instantly realizing where work is needed.

trans-unit.source: Shall the new role be a superuser? (y/n) n
trans-unit.target: Должна ли новая роль быть суперпользователем? (y/n)n

trans-unit.source: Shall the new role be allowed to create databases? (y/n) y
trans-unit.target: Должна ли новая роль быть разрешена для создания баз данных? (y/n)y

trans-unit.source: Shall the new role be allowed to create more new roles? (y/n) n
trans-unit.target: Должна ли новая роль быть разрешена для создания новых ролей? (y/n)n

trans-unit.source: The code is at https://anonscm.debian.org/cgit/pet/pet3.git/, database dumps can be found at http://pet.43-1.org/~pet/db/.
trans-unit.target: The code is at https://anonscm.debian.org/cgit/pet/pet3.git/, database dumps can be found at http://pet.43-1.org/~pet/db/.

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to install Pet. With or without vagrant. Choose one and follow the next steps to install.
trans-unit.target: Есть два способа установить Pet.С бродягой или без.Выберите один и выполните следующие шаги по установке.

trans-unit.source: To install PET, it is necessary to clone the repository and start vagrant:
trans-unit.target: Для установки PET необходимо клонировать репозиторий и запустить бродягу:

trans-unit.source: To start the web interface, execute:
Vagrant can be installed with the command: apt-get install vagrant. And all the binaries are in this page [Vagrant Download](https://www.vagrantup.com/downloads.html).
trans-unit.target: Vagrant can be installed with the command: apt-get install vagrant. And all the binaries are in this page [Vagrant Download](https://www.vagrantup.com/downloads.html).

trans-unit.source: Vagrant is a tool for building complete development environments. With an easy-to-use workflow and focus on automation, Vagrant lowers development environment setup time, increases development/production parity, and makes the “works on my machine” excuse a relic of the past. [Official Site Reference](https://www.vagrantup.com/).
trans-unit.target: Vagrant is a tool for building complete development environments. With an easy-to-use workflow and focus on automation, Vagrant lowers development environment setup time, increases development/production parity, and makes the “works on my machine” excuse a relic of the past. [Official Site Reference](https://www.vagrantup.com/).

trans-unit.source: pet=> INSERT INTO archive (name, url, web_root) VALUES (‘debian’, ‘http://cdn.debian.net/debian’, ‘http://packages.qa.debian.org/’);
trans-unit.target: pet=> INSERT INTO archive (name, url, web_root) VALUES (‘debian’, ‘http://cdn.debian.net/debian’, ‘http://packages.qa.debian.org/’);

trans-unit.source: pet=> INSERT INTO package (name, repository_id) VALUES (‘clive’, 1);
trans-unit.target: pet=> INSERT INTO package (name, repository_id) VALUES (‘clive’, 1);

trans-unit.source: pet=> INSERT INTO repository (name, type, root, web_root, team_id) VALUES (‘git’,’git’,’https://pet.alioth.debian.org/pet2-data/pkg-perl/git-pkg-perl-packages.json’,’http://anonscm.debian.org/gitweb/?p=pkg-perl/packages’, 1);
trans-unit.target: pet=> INSERT INTO repository (name, type, root, web_root, team_id) VALUES (‘git’,’git’,’https://pet.alioth.debian.org/pet2-data/pkg-perl/git-pkg-perl-packages.json’,’http://anonscm.debian.org/gitweb/?p=pkg-perl/packages’, 1);

trans-unit.source: pet=> INSERT INTO suite (archive_id, name) VALUES (1, ‘unstable’);
trans-unit.target: pet=> INSERT INTO suite (archive_id, name) VALUES (1, ‘unstable’);

trans-unit.source: pet=> INSERT INTO team (name, maintainer, url) VALUES (‘pkg-perl’, ‘Debian Perl Group <pkg-perl-maintainers@lists.alioth.debian.org>’, ‘http://pkg-perl.alioth.debian.org/’);
trans-unit.target: pet=> INSERT INTO team (name, maintainer, url) VALUES (‘pkg-perl’, ‘Debian Perl Group <pkg-perl-maintainers@lists.alioth.debian.org>’, ‘http://pkg-perl.alioth.debian.org/’);

trans-unit.source: x is a positive integer of the repository. e.g. pass 1. This command will return all packages.
trans-unit.target: x-это положительное целое число репозитория,например,передача 1.Эта команда вернет все пакеты.
